scripts.build:moment: ngc -p moment && java -jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --flagfile closure.base.conf moment/node_modules/moment/moment.js moment/node_modules/moment/package.json moment/externs.js --entry_point=moment/built/bootstrap --js_output_file=moment/built/bundle.js
scripts.test: tsc -p tsconfig.tests.json && concurrently "yarn run serve" protractor --kill-others --success first
